title: The Great Gatsby

description: A classic novel about the American Dream.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird

description: A powerful story of racial injustice and moral growth.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A timeless tale of love and societal expectations.

title: The Catcher in the Rye

description: A story of teenage rebellion and alienation.

title: Moby Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: An epic tale of obsession and the sea.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy adventure about Bilbo Baggins.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A vision of a future society driven by technology.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An epic fantasy trilogy about the quest to destroy the One Ring.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A story about following your dreams and listening to your heart.
